name: HomegearGpio::setEdge
shortDescription: Sets the edge of a GPIO for which interrupts are to be generated
description: This method sets the edge of a GPIO for which interrupts are to be generated. Before this method is called, the GPIO needs to be opened with HomegearGpio::open().

parameters.name: edge
parameters.description: This is the edge for which interrupts need to be generated. Possible values are HomegearGpio::EDGE_RISING (0), HomegearGpio::EDGE_FALLING (1), and HomegearGpio::EDGE_BOTH (2).
